product_details.name: Pizza Lover's High-Top Canvas Sneakers - Deliciously Stylish Pepperoni Print
product_details.description:
• Ultra-realistic pizza print featuring mouthwatering pepperoni design
• High-quality canvas upper with durable rubber sole
• Classic high-top silhouette with comfortable padding
• White contrast laces and vintage-style rubber toe cap
• Perfect blend of comfort and unique food-inspired fashion
• Breathable fabric lining for all-day wear
• Distinctive cream-colored midsole with black striping
• Eye-catching conversation starter for pizza enthusiasts
• Available in unisex sizing
• Ideal for casual wear, food festivals, or restaurant staff
• Water-resistant canvas material
• Easy to clean and maintain

banner_details:
This banner features a fun and bold promotional design for a stylish product—a pizza-themed canvas sneaker. At the top center, the **heading** text layer displays the product name in a chunky, eye-catching font in dark brown, giving it a retro feel. Below it, the **subheading** layer describes the product type in capitalized, vibrant orange text, enhancing visibility and emphasis. The focal point of the banner is the **product_image**, showcasing the sneaker angled dynamically at the center. At the bottom, against a wave-shaped orange background, the **price** layer is prominently displayed in bold white text, accompanied by a **cta_background** rectangle with the **cta** text ("SHOP NOW") in white, encouraging interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream White: `#F9F2E7`
- Deep Brown: `#8B2801`
- Bright Orange: `#EC4E20`
- Sunset Orange: `#FF6B4A`
- Soft Peach: `#FFCB8E`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: This product image features a high-top sneaker with a vibrant and playful pizza design, blending bold colors in an eye-catching way. The dominant tones are warm and appetizing: golden crusts (Hex: #F3BE78), rich tomato-sauce reds (Hex: #C1272D), pepperoni burgundy (Hex: #8B1A1A), and melted cheese yellows (Hex: #FAD390). Bright green herbs (Hex: #4CAF50) are sparsely used for accent, adding a pop of freshness. The white laces and inner lining (Hex: #ECECEC) contrast cleanly against the vivid pizza imagery, creating balance and visual interest. These colors fuse realism and novelty, ideal for a fun, food-themed lifestyle product advertisement.
